sentence.Network_en: A brittle, grayish - brown, Arctic lichen ( Cetraria islandica ) sometimes a food or in medicine.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种易碎 、 绿褐色的北冰洋地衣植物 ( 冰岛衣冰岛衣属 ),有时用作食物或药物.

list.abs: 蕾莉欧冰洲局... ... Disodium cocoamphodiacetate 椰油酰（两性）基二乙酸二钠, ... Cetraria islandica 冰岛苔 Usnic acid 地衣酸.
通常从冰岛冰岛衣(Cetraria islandica)中提取。呈棕黄色或棕色粉末(有淡白色粉末)，溶于沸水、盐酸。
曾用名“鹿石蕊云杉林”。岛衣冻原 cetraria tundra-

means.word_mean: 1. foliose lichens chiefly of northern latitudes

auth_sentence.content: They walked out into soft gray carpets of Cetraria islandica, the lichen that is known as Iceland moss.
auth_sentence.res_content: They walked out into soft gray carpets of Cetraria islandica, the lichen that is known as Iceland moss.
